DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study evaluate effectiveness Kinesio Taping method knee osteoarthritis . Using simple concealed randomization procedure form two group ( kinesio tap control-nonspecific tap ) 100 knee osteoarthritis patient . 1 month patient ( depend group allocate ) receive either kinesio tap application non-specific taping : 4 application per subject . Three time : taping , month tape , 1 month without tape evaluation knee function , mobility , quality life evaluate , include clinical examination knee joint , measurement knee flexion extension goniometer , circumference leg knee , ½ thigh ½ calf ( evaluate edema ) ; pain evaluate questionnaire , patella tendon algometry ; force calf flexor extensor evaluate use Lovett manual muscle test scale , goniometry knee flexion/extension ; mobility , knee function , life quality evaluation - 10 Meter Walk , Five Times Sit Stand Tests perform , Knee injury Osteoarthritis Outcome Score ( KOOS ) Medical Outcomes Study Short Form 36 2 version ( SF-36 2v ) questionnaire use . Also data need analgesic medicament collect subject .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Kinesio Taping Method Knee Osteoarthritis .
DOC.detailed_description: After subject inclusion research , two group ( study ( kinesio tap ) group control-non specific tap ) 100 patient formed procedure conceal randomization ( person connect study help random number generator make allocation subject group ) . All subject receive tap ( kinesio non specific ) one month ( tape apply week , 4 time per person , hold skin 6 day one day break - without tape ) . Subjects allow use conventional analgesic medicament 'per o ' parenterally need . Control Kinesio tap application do certify kinesio tap practitioner ( CKTP ) team member train CKTP ( researcher ' B ' ) . Other research team member ( researcher ' A ' ) evaluation choose criterion ( pain , knee function , mobility etc . ) , inform group ( kinesio tap placebo ) subject allocate , researcher ( researcher ' A ' ) repeat evaluation subject first second month participation study . Taping application : Control . For non specific tap Kinesio Tape tex Gold finger print ( FP ) use , however tape apply without use specific application manner kinesio tap method . I.e . - tape apply subject lie position knee fully extend use 0 % available tension 10 cm 10cm superior inferior pole patella ( approx 5x25cm ) medial lateral side knee joint ( small piece tape approx . 5x5cm ) Kinesio tap . Kinesio Tape tex Gold FP use . Subjects get two Y strip apply lymphatic correction manner use paper tension ( tape apply fully flexed knee position ) ; two I strip applied patella tendon lateral medial collateral ligament use 75-100 % tension : patella tendon - fully flexed knee position , 100 % tension ; ligament - 20-30 degree knee flexion,75 % tension ; end -with tension , - seek increase stimulation mechanoreceptors area , improve proprioception reduce pain . All subject , start research , inform write well spoken form research , 's type , goal , possible inconvenience ( possible skin irritation , hair pick etc. ) . Every subject right stop participation research time .
DOC.criteria: diagnose ( radiologically verify ) IIII stage knee osteoarthritis , contraindication ( exclusion criterion ) participate research , willing follow study protocol give informed approval participate research write form . Rheumatoid arthritis systemic rheumatoid disease ( LE , sclerodermia , .. etc ) Fragile , sensitive skin 's lesion area tape apply Inability functional test accord study protocol due impair knee function severe comorbidities . Diagnosed suspected cancer area tape apply < 6 month intraarticular injection knee joint Constant usage analgesic medicament due comorbidities Pregnancy History Kinesio Taping method application past Need orthotics Unwillingness use local ointment knee region participation study period ( i.e . 2 month )
DOC.keyword: knee osteoarthritis , kinesio taping , knee function , pain
